hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Deku Stick Capacity# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

GC (Maze).text: The hint stone you have dialed&has been disconnected.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of time.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Map# and #a Compass#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that Phantom Ganon is a big Louisa May Alcott fan.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Bombchu Shop#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Ice Cavern#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Fire Arrows# can be found in #Goron City#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #5# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #2# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #the Sun's Song#.
